txt.en: 'In Gorthad Nûr the dead walk, and fight, and rage against the living! I would not have believed it, but I have seen even worse in this vale of terror, and so have you. But you have quieted their anger and sent fleeing the spirits that inhabited them. You have my thanks and the thanks of those whose bones they disturbed, I expect!' - Thurindol
Defeat many wights within Gorthad Nûr, the Deep-barrow.
